creator: Moodbeam
descriptionHtml:
Moodbeam aims to put the power of self-reflection and emotional awareness in everyone’s hands to make mood visible, conversations easier and the world a happier place.

Giving you the ability to keep track of how you or someone you know is feeling at any time, the Moodbeam App works exclusively with the Moodbeam One wearable which is available to buy from www.moodbeam.co.uk

See your highs and lows, explore patterns and trends throughout the day, month or year, add notes, compare sleep and activity against mood, set mood prompts, or choose to share your mood profile with those that matter, all in one place.

With this information at your fingertips you’ll not only understand more about how and why you were feeling a certain way, but you’ll have the tools to help make decisions leading to a happier, more positive tomorrow.

Let’s change the way the world sees mood.

FEATURES INCLUDED

TRACK AND VISUALISE MOOD
Connect your Moodbeam wearable device with the app to easily sync and store how you are feeling wherever you are, whatever you’re doing. Every moment can be reviewed at a time to suit you. See how your day has been, or stay in touch with how someone you care about is feeling, without the need to ask.

COMPARE MOOD AGAINST SLEEP AND ACTIVITY
Visualise your mood, or that of someone you care about, over a chosen period of time alongside sleep and activity data.

FIND PATTERNS AND TRENDS
By gaining real insight through patterns and trends, Moodbeam brings better understanding of how you feel, helping you live a happier life. At a glance see the moments of each day and week when your feelings were strongest. The more you use your Moodbeam One, the more you will learn.

TAKE NOTE
Use the app’s journal to make notes that give your Moodbeam moments meaning. This is not only a great way to reflect on your day but it makes it easier for you to look back and make sense of the past.

SHARE HOW YOU FEEL
Whether it's with family, trusted friends or a health professional, choose and control who you share your mood data with or who shares with you. Understanding how someone you know has been feeling without the need to ask gives you the opportunity to start a simple conversation that can mean so much..

DEFINE WHAT MOOD MEANS TO YOU
Customise your mood labels depending on what you want to track. Whether general happiness or motivation levels at work, making Moodbeam work for you is simple.

KEEP IN SYNC
Once you have connected your Moodbeam wearable, the app will keep your Mood profile in perfect harmony.

SETUP MOOD PROMPTS
Create and sync your Moodbeam wearable to prompt you into a moment of reflection. It’s not often we ask ourselves how we’re feeling, now Moodbeam can give you the reminder you need.

NOTIFICATIONS
Stay in the loop with new updates and feature releases for the app and your Moodbeam One.

ONE ACCOUNT, MULTIPLE DEVICES
Use Moodbeam with your whole family on a single device.

Learn more about Moodbeam at www.moodbeam.co.uk
descriptionShort: Let’s change the way the world sees mood.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The latest version of the App resolves a range of bugs and minor design improvements
Bug fixes
- Fix when choosing custom data range in patterns
- Removal of unnecessary white space when selecting time of the day on moments screen
- Date of birth selection fix
- Device connection improvements
- Fix for bug when updating/removing prompts
If you have any feedback or would like to see a feature improvement or introduction, get in touch with us and let us know using our email hello@moodbeam.co.uk

descriptionShort: Let’s change the way the world sees mood.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This new release of the Moodbeam App allows you to now use your Moodbeam wearable and App wherever you are in the world.
New features
- The ability to select your local time zone on account creation or through your profile settings.
- View your mood data adjusted to your selected time zone.
Bug fixes
- Resolved issues relating to using TouchID for login to the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bug fixes:
- Missing data for some users with multiple devices
As always, if you have any feedback or would like to see a feature improvement or introduction, get in touch with us and let us know using our email hello@moodbeam.co.uk.

descriptionShort: Let’s change the way the world sees mood.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The latest version of the Moodbeam App includes the addition of new features as well as a number of bug fixes and improvements.

New features:
- In app Mood buttons that allow you to log your mood if your wearable device is not with you or low on battery

Improvements:
- Background syncing of mood data when App is minimised
- Connectivity improvements between Moodbeam One wearable and Moodbeam App
- Pairing assistance for IOS and Android

descriptionShort: Let’s change the way the world sees mood.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The latest version of the Moodbeam App resolves a range of bugs including the:
- ability to connect to a shared account
- default profile for accounts who have shared accounts
- disappearance of virtual buttons for those who have logged in with touchID or faceID
- date of birth defaulting to incorrect day and month
